Screenwriter: Nadine Labaki, Jihad Hojeily, Michelle Kesrouani, Georges Khabbaz, Khaled Mouzanar
Production Co: Louverture Films, Boo Films, Open City Films, KNM Films, Les Films des Tournelles, Mooz Films, The Bridge Production, Synchronicity Production
Synopsis: After fleeing his negligent and abusive parents, a hardened, streetwise 12-year-old boy sues them to protest the life they've given him.
Title: Capernaum
